title: Alessandra Ambrosio works her magic in leather trousers and low-cut top
text:
When you got it, flaunt it.

That's the modus operandi of Brazilian bombshell Alessandra Ambrosio, who paraded her considerable natural beauty on Friday night while out to dinner at a high-end Italian eatery on the west side of Los Angeles.

Ambrosio, 38, was out to dinner with boyfriend Nicolo Oddi and her son Noah, who she filmed for her Instagram stories chowing down on a plate of pasta.

Parading it: Brazilian bombshell Alessandra Ambrosio flaunted her considerable natural beauty on Friday night while out to dinner at a high-end Italian eatery on the west side of LA

Alessandra sported a fresh face for the outing, whisking her beautifully straight long brown hair away from her eyes.

The model wore tight black leggings and a black tank, along with black suede ankle boots.

Over the tank, she wore a charming loose knit taupe sweater, which featured a wide open collar and ribbon detailing along the sleeves.

The ribbons extended past the cuffs of the sweater and trailed in the breeze around Ambrosio, adding motion to her appealing look.

Beauty in motion: Alessandra sported a fresh face for the outing, whisking her beautifully straight long brown hair away from her eyes

Her bare shoulder peeked out of the knit top, which also looked slightly shredded along the edges.

Ambrosio completed the look with some layered necklaces, including one pendant that was a crescent moon.

The day before her Italian dinner outing, Alessandra had some fun in a different-looking hairstyle on the Malibu set of her latest fashion photo shoot.

For the Roberto Cavalli campaign she was working, the 5ft9in beauty sported a pixie-cut wig.

Peek-a-boo: Her bare shoulder peeked out of her knit top, which looked slightly shredded along the edges

She donned a gold motorcycle jacket and white pleated pants for the edgy look, posing on an aqua-colored convertible similar to the 1966 Ford Thunderbird driven in the now classic film Thelma and Louise.

Ever the social media maven, Ambrosio posted a selfie in the wig to her Instagram story for her 17.3M social media followers.

'Short hair kinda day!' she announced in the caption.
description: Brazilian bombshell Alessandra Ambrosio paraded her considerable natural beauty on Friday night while out to dinner at a high-end Italian eatery on the west side of LA.
